original_title: Le Nozze di Figaro — Grand Théâtre de Genève
overview: The production bears the imprint of the conductor, Marko Letonja, and the director, Tobias Richter, whose understanding is ideal: both breathe a troupe spirit - specific to comedy - into this heterogeneous cast, which brings together young and old. Both give as much importance to recitatives as to arias and ensembles.
title: The Marriage Of Figaro - Grand Théâtre de Genève
